public interface Condition<T>

Interface for a condition check on an object.

Method Summary
 boolean check(T t)
          Checks if the condition is met for the specified object.
 

Method Detail

check

boolean check(T t)
Checks if the condition is met for the specified object.

Parameters:
t - Object being checked against the condition.
Returns:
Returns true if the condition is fulfilled by the specified object.
